resources.string: Assistant Professor, National Institute of Technology, Delhi

Working as an Assistant Professor ,Department of CSE, Graphic Era Deemed to be University, Dehradun, India. Previously Worked as Assistant Professor ,Department of CSE, NIT Delhi, India , and Department of IT, NIT Jalandhar, India. My passion towards teaching and research drives me for doing some innovative and practically implemented publications for wellness of our society. I have an eager interest in contributing towards betterment of society by means of technology. My areas of interest for research work is Cloud Computing, Machine Learning and Internet of Things (IoT). I completed Ph.D. in Computer Science (Cloud Computing, BBAU Central University, Lucknow). M.Tech from Central University, Lucknow. B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from RTU Kota. Looking for Postdoc Fellow in Cloud //IoT/SDN/Data Science.
